tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor friendly and examined the problem I was experiencing and gave some medication. So feeling better then before. Need to wait and see results after completion of medicine.  I recommend Dr.  Santhosh doctor for any nerve related issue.  But the Test inside hospital is expensive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe one sided headache from almost 2 months. Consulted Dr Santhosh for headache treatment.Now my condition has improved a lot.Excellent, Satisfied with the way he explained the doubts *** ********* *** **** *********** I strongly recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Disrespect towards elderly. He addressed my mother with a singular tone not even giving respect to her age. He used a harsh tone in asking my mother some things which she couldn't understand at once due to her age induced slight hearing disability. **** *** ********** ******** ****** *** ****** ********* *** * ***** **** ********* **** ****** ********* ** ******** *** ****** ** *********** ** **** *****

review:
Dr should understand that the patient cannot be treated by assuming. 
I visited him for getting treatment for numbness in hands n legs ,Coming to the treatment after meeting him numbness in my hands and legs became more.

I would never recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Good doctor. Low consultation fees compared to any other neurologist in bangalore. Fully satisfied with him

My chronic head ache improved. Will definitely recommend him to others. Clinic ideally situated. Just find it in google maps
I am fully satisfied with him and is been following up with him

review: kosys hospital EEG test cost was expensive compare to others. Dr.Santosh treatment was fair enough and after undergoing 15 days of treatment its has been cured..thanks to doctor.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: I booked the appointment on 08-11-18, I have to wait for more then 1 hour but at the last I get to know that doctor is on leave.disappointed with the pectro and hospital service

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Waited so long time for to meet doctor, I took one hour. There is no proper scheduled appointment. Otherwise* ********* *** good

tags: Wait time,
review:
The first test I was asked to do was a video EEG to find any weak nerves. That comes with a cost of 2500 rs in Koshys hospital which is totally unexpected for a minor muscle pain. 
As expected there was nothing wrong in the results and it was an unwanted test really.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Very bad experience..we waited for one hour..d receptionist don't even know when d doctor will arrive.. doctor advised for nerve conduction study single limb but d technician and billing ppl asked me to pay for both limbs...when I enquired dey are very arrogant..very bad koshy hospital..dey won't respond to customer

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been to many doctors but the way in which Dr Santosh elaborates patients problem is excellent.He makes the patient relate his problem with the symptoms.I went with my elder brother and was fully satisfied with his explanation and suggestions regarding our problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was having a long-standing headache for 15 days and had consulted with Dr. Santhosh Kumar, Neurologist at Koshys Hospital. Thanks to him, my headache is not there now. A good doctor who had the patience to listen to you and *** *** **** ***** ** treat you properly.

tags: None
review:
Good doctor. Patiently listens to you *** **** ****** ********* *
My tremors have disappeared  with his treatment, He even gives patient information booklets and explain to you your diseases in our own language
